mapper.select: select A.topic_no, A.topic_endate, A.topic_type, A.topic_title, A.topic_short_cont, B.topic_long_cont, B.topic_pro, B.topic_con, C.debate_endate, C.debate_tot_pro, C.debate_tot_con, C.debate_tot_neut, (Select user_nick From user_tbl where user_no = A.user_no) AS user_nick FROM topic_tbl AS A INNER JOIN topic_detail_tbl AS B INNER JOIN debate_tbl AS C where A.topic_no = #{topic_no} and B.topic_no = #{topic_no} and C.topic_no = #{topic_no}
select topic_resource_title, topic_resource_link from topic_resource_tbl where topic_no = #{topic_no}

select A.op_no, A.user_no, A.op_content,A.op_rel, A.op_regdate, A.vote_type,(Select user_nick From user_tbl where user_no = A.user_no) AS user_nick, (Select user_lv From user_tbl where user_no = A.user_no) AS user_lv, (Select count(op_like) From op_like_tbl where op_no = A.op_no) AS op_count, (Select count(op_like) From op_like_tbl where op_no = A.op_no and op_like = 0) AS op_like from opinion_tbl AS A where topic_no = #{topic_no}
mapper.update: update debate_tbl set debate_tot_pro = debate_tot_pro+1 where topic_no = #{topic_no}
update debate_tbl set debate_tot_con = debate_tot_con+1 where topic_no = #{topic_no}
update debate_tbl set debate_tot_neut = debate_tot_neut+1 where topic_no = #{topic_no}
mapper.select: select user_no from vote_tbl where topic_no = #{topic_no} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: insert into op_like_tbl (op_no, user_no, op_like) values(#{op_no}, #{user_no}, #{op_like})
mapper.select: select op_no from op_like_tbl where user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: insert into opinion_tbl (user_no, topic_no, op_content, op_rel, op_regdate, vote_type) values(#{user_no}, #{topic_no}, #{op_content}, #{op_rel}, now() ,#{vote_type})
mapper.update: update opinion_tbl set op_content = #{op_content} where op_no = #{op_no}
mapper.select: select op_no from opinion_tbl where op_rel = #{op_rel} and op_content = #{op_content} and vote_type = #{vote_type} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tag_tbl (tag_op_no, tagged_op_no, topic_no) values(#{tag_op_no},#{tagged_op_no}, #{topic_no})
mapper.select: select tag_op_no, tagged_op_no from tag_tbl where topic_no = #{topic_no}
